lead_paragraph: The police say that the video, which appears to show a police pickup truck running over a protester, was faked and that no deaths were reported in that area.
snippet: The police say that the video, which appears to show a police pickup truck running over a protester, was faked and that no deaths were reported in that area.

headline.main: Video of Attack on Protester Is a Fake, Iranian Police Say
headline.print_headline: Video of Attack on Protester Is a Fake, Iranian Police Say
